required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Capsular Bag Shape Changes After Plate-haptic Intraocular Lens Implantation by SS-OCT
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Capsular Bag Shape Changes After Plate-haptic Intraocular Lens Implantation by SS-OCT.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of capsular bag shape changes after plate-haptic intraocular lens implantation by SS-OCT.

detailed_description.textblock: Eighty patients (80 eyes) with simple age-related cataracts were treated from December 2019 to December 2020 in the Wenzhou Medical University. Investigators specifically included patients who were bodily healthy and underwent a successful implantation of an IOL. Inclusion criteria for this study were patients who were older than 40 years old, had an axial length of 22-26mm, and could complete 4 follow-up visits.

primary_outcome.description: capsule bend formation has 5 continuous stages from 0 to 4，The stage score varies over different positions of the same capsule bag, because the capsule bend formation is inconsistent along the entire optic edge. CBI is the mean of the different stage scores in different positions and represents the general capsule bend state of the whole capsule bag.

arm_group.description: implanted with the C-loop haptic intraocular lens
implanted with the plate haptic intraocular lens

study_pop.textblock: The patients were divided into 2 groups according to the different intraocular lenses implanted: 39 eyes were implanted with the C-loop haptic intraocular lens (Acrysof) while the other 41 eyes were implanted with plate haptic intraocular lenses (CT ASPHINA 509 M).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
-patients who were older than 40 years old, had an axial length of 22-26mm, and could complete 4 follow-up visits.
Exclusion Criteria:
- people cannot cooperate with the check， corneal opacity, glaucoma, and other eye diseases
- any other previous intraocular surgery, and intraoperative complications including anterior or posterior capsulartears
- Continuous circular capsulorhexis is not centered and Mydriasis is less than 7mm.

facility.name: Eye Hospital of Wenzhou Medical College

responsible_party.investigator_title: Vice president of Eye Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University
